title: Animics
description: Web-based tool for generating 3D character animations, with a strong focus on sign language and embodied communication.

title: Performs
description: Performs is designed to visualize and synthesize humanoid animations for customized avatars. You can play animation files or synthesize them in real-time from instructions.

title: Performs Atelier
description: This tool helps set up all the necessary parameters to create a configuration file that can be used with the Performs script animation system.

title: Searebbel
description: Real-time 3D navigation visualization tool on the web.

title: The Good Rave
description: Video game created for the Global Game Jam 2024 using the Godot engine. Imagine Paper's Please, but as the substitute of Saint Peter wanting to throw a rave party in Heaven.
